attributes.action: make Arsenal play "We Will Rock You" before home games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please undersign if you think the song before Arsenal come out should be "We will Rock You" with the lyrics below:

''Buddy we're the young men hard men

Shoutin in the street ''We're gonna Win today''

Mud on our face

Makin u Disgraced

Wavin our Banner all over the place

Singin We are We are Arsenal!''


Rather than coming out to Wonder of you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
